name: Star Run: Flying Rocket Game
description:
Challenge your piloting skills and reflexes in this addictive and fun game. Avoid and dodge the evil planets and enemy spaceship while flying through the hostile universe. Don't forget to collect the stars on the way to boost speed and increase the score.

HOW TO PLAY :
- Tap the screen to fly the rocket.
- Avoid planets and other obstacles.
- Collect stars to boost and speed up the rocket.

GAME FEATURES:
- Simple one touch game controls.
- Easy to play but hard to master.
- Addictive and endless gameplay mode.
- Awesome effects and cool design.

Looks easy? Try it out and let us know your feedbacks to make it even better!
Have fun!
